rows.label: tev010701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Camber about Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Camber if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0001
rows.name:
What's that, newbie? You wanna pilot a Skell?
Ha! I'm guessing you don't have a license.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0002
rows.name:
If you want to pilot a Skell, you'll need to get yourself
a license by passing the license test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0003
rows.name:
That test would be a lot to handle for a tenderfoot
like yourself. Fact is, I doubt they'd even let you take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0004
rows.name:
But if you can make a name for yourself out there,
Commander Vandham himself will invite you to take it
sooner or later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0005
rows.name:
For now, don't even worry about Skells.
Just focus on completing those missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Me? I'm obsessed with Skells—and there's no shortage
of BLADEs who feel the same way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0011
rows.name:
But the biggest Skell fan is probably that one girl in the
Outfitters division. She's 100 percent insane about 'em![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0012
rows.name:
When we go out to dinner together, she spends so
much time talking about Skells that she forgets to eat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0013
rows.name:
We got caught up in Skell talk at the diner the other
night and totally lost track of time. Before I knew it,
I could see the sunrise outside the window.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0014
rows.name:
If that sounds like your kind of night, head on down
to the Outfitters test hangar, look for a young woman
staring intently at a Skell, and strike up a conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0024
rows.name:
If you want to pilot a Skell, you'll need to complete
grueling tasks assigned by Commander Vandham
in order to earn your Skell license.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0025
rows.name:
My license test was backbreaking. I had a big list of
indigens to kill and precious resources to gather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0026
rows.name:
I very nearly killed myself trying to bring down a
tyrant, and that was just ONE of my tasks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0027
rows.name:
At the time, I hated Commander Vandham for putting
me through that hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0028
rows.name:
But I'm still using the things I learned in that test.
Hell, I doubt I'd be alive today if I hadn't had to
toughen myself up like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0043
rows.name: Light-type Skells excel at evasion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0044
rows.name:
A lot of people prioritize armor, so light-type models
tend to get overlooked. But who needs armor if your
enemies can't land a hit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0045
rows.name:
An evasive fighting style can also reduce the odds
of your Skell being destroyed in battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0046
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong—I have a lot of respect for the
resilience of the heavy-type Skells. It's really just a
matter of personal preference.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0060
rows.name:
Everyone in the hangars is obsessively tinkering with
those new flight-module-equipped Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0061
rows.name:
And I'm certainly no exception. Their invention has sent
me back to the drawing board to radically rethink the
way we arm flight-capable Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0062
rows.name:
I'm barely getting any sleep! I can't stop thinking
about what the optimal weapons system would be for
a flying Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0063
rows.name:
The more I consider it, the more infinite the possibilities
seem. There are so many cool things we could do!
How am I supposed to push that aside and just sleep?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Camber about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0064
rows.name:
I heard the whole story from Mika.
I am so sorry for what she put you through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0065
rows.name:
I just don't understand why she would do something
like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0066
rows.name:
But she was a member of our team, so if there's
anything we can do to make this right, just tell us.
We'll do whatever we can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0068
rows.name:
For the millionth time, I'll be fine!
Mika's let me take her Skell out loads of times![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0069
rows.name: Yeah, but if you mess this up, you could die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0072
rows.name:
I told you I'm not gonna mess up, so stop worrying!
You need to be looking after Mika now anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Camber about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0073
rows.name: Hey, thanks for saving me back there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0074
rows.name:
As for the Skell, Alexa has it back in perfect
working order, and it's ready to return to service.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0075
rows.name:
She's been a big help around here. I ought to buy her
dinner one of these days to say thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0077
rows.name:
That's sweet and all, Camber, but I'd be happier if
you treated me to some Skell components.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0080
rows.name:
In fact, they just released some new ones that I've had
my eye on...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0083
rows.name:
Ha! I should have guessed you'd rather starve than
neglect your Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0086
rows.name:
Hmmm... Actually, if I really want to thank Alexa,
I should probably just buy her a new Skell component.
I bet she'd like that better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_MSG0087
rows.name:
Yeah, I'm pretty sure she'd rather starve than neglect
her Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Camber about light-type Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Camber about the Skell flight module.[ST:wait ]
